Body.Content:
What and Why

Weâ€™re introducing a new integration between Viva Glint and Viva Pulse that enables managers and leaders to take timely, targeted action following an organization-wide Glint engagement survey. This feature helps maintain momentum on engagement efforts by recommending Pulse questions aligned to the top strengths and opportunities identified in the Glint survey. This supports a more continuous feedback loop and empowers managers to track progress and make mid-point adjustments.

Rollout Schedule

  • General Availability: Available now.

Impact on Your Organization

  • Who is affected:
    • Viva Glint customers with eligible licenses (Viva Suite or Viva Workplace Analytics and Employee Feedback).
    • Glint admins and managers using Viva Pulse.
  • What will happen:
    • Managers can launch a Viva Pulse survey after a Glint engagement survey to gather follow-up insights.
    • Recommended Pulse questions are based on Glint survey results.
    • The integration is off by default and must be enabled by a Glint admin.
    • No changes will occur unless the integration is explicitly enabled.
    • Available only to tenants with the required Viva licenses.

Action Required / Recommendations

  • Review your current Viva Glint and Pulse configuration.
  • Notify Glint admins that the integration is available but off by default.
  • Enable the integration in the Viva Glint admin settings if desired.
  • Ensure your organization has one of the following licenses:
    • Viva Suite
    • Viva Workplace Analytics and Employee Feedback
  • Communicate this change to helpdesk or internal support teams.
  • Update internal documentation as needed.

Learn more: Take actions after Viva Glint engagement surveys | Microsoft Learn

Compliance Considerations

No compliance considerations identified, review as appropriate for your organization.
